text:
BREAKING: Google just launched 'AI Educator Hub'.

11 resources are now available for FREE.

Here’s what you can learn:

→ Guardian’s Guide to AI
→ Discover AI in Daily Life
→ Google’s LearnLM Models
→ A Guide to AI in Education
→ Generative AI for Educators
→ Teaching responsible use of AI
→ AI Track for Education Pilot Program
→ Get Started with Gemini for Workspace
→ Teach AI’s AI Guidance for Schools Toolkit
→ Future of Education Global Research Report
→ How Google for Education Champions Use AI

To access it: https://lnkd.in/eB5fjyhd
To master AI with words (no code) how-to-ai.guide
To access the OpenAI version: academy.openai.com
